ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Designed to create and display complex tables with R, the 'rtables' R package allows cells in an 'rtables' object to contain any high-dimensional data structure, which can then be displayed with cell-specific formatting instructions. Additionally, the 'rtables.officer' package supports export formats related to the Microsoft Office software suite, including Microsoft Word ('docx') and Microsoft PowerPoint ('pptx').

Designed to create and display complex tables with R, the 'rtables' R package allows cells in an 'rtables' object to contain any high-dimensional data structure, which can then be displayed with cell-specific formatting instructions. Additionally, the 'rtables.officer' package supports export formats related to the Microsoft Office software suite, including Microsoft Word ('docx') and Microsoft PowerPoint ('pptx').

name: r-rtables.officer
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.1.2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-rtables.officer
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/rtables.officer_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/rtables.officer/rtables.officer_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 3ee48ca00a15718665c26903012ac98f58bd3bd479a1321640ff7d3e63f563fd

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'        # [win]
    - '*/Rblas.dll'    # [win]
    - '*/Rlapack.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-checkmate >=2.1.0
    - r-flextable >=0.9.10
    - r-formatters >=0.5.12
    - r-lifecycle >=0.2.0
    - r-officer >=0.7.1
    - r-rlistings >=0.2.13
    - r-rtables >=0.6.15
    - r-stringi >=1.6
    - r-systemfonts
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-checkmate >=2.1.0
    - r-flextable >=0.9.10
    - r-formatters >=0.5.12
    - r-lifecycle >=0.2.0
    - r-officer >=0.7.1
    - r-rlistings >=0.2.13
    - r-rtables >=0.6.15
    - r-stringi >=1.6
    - r-systemfonts

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('rtables.officer')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('rtables.officer')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/insightsengineering/rtables.officer, https://insightsengineering.github.io/rtables.officer/
  license: Apache-2.0
  summary: Designed to create and display complex tables with R, the 'rtables' R package allows cells in an 'rtables' object to contain any high-dimensional data structure, which can then be displayed with cell-specific formatting instructions. Additionally, the 'rtables.officer' package supports export formats related to
    the Microsoft Office software suite, including Microsoft Word ('docx') and Microsoft PowerPoint ('pptx').
  license_family: APACHE
  license_file:
    - LICENSE-2.0.txt

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
